summary: The gloomy, hate-filled lives of a group of teenage guys in the south of Sweden suddenly turn around when one of the guys' hippie-like cousin shows up.
cast: Andreas Karoliussen|Nicolaj Schröder|Magnus Skog|Alexander Stocks|Melker Henningsson|Jarle Furali|Josefin Ljungman|Evamaria Björk|Cecilia Borssén|Håkan Brinck|Lotten Crafoord-Larsen|Henrik Danielsson|Naima Frankel|Torsten Gunnehill|Catherine Jeppsson|Sabina Lindell|Kristian Nielsen|Hans Polster|Jonatan Rodriguez|Kalle Rydberg|Thomas Ungewitter
keywords: eastern europe|swedish lifestyle|place name in title
title: Hata Göteborg
